DiscardAndGainEnergy.NAME: C R Y S T A L SEAL

ScoutAttacks.NAME: CIRCLE
ScoutAttacks.DESCRIPTION: $draw NL Discard all cards drawn this way that are not Attacks.

AllForOneButSkills.NAME: shrug
AllForOneButSkills.DESCRIPTION: Put all Skills from your discard pile into your hand. NL $ethereal NL $exhaust
AllForOneButSkills.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Put all Skills from your discard pile into your hand ignoring max hand size. NL $ethereal NL $exhaust

SpreadCold.NAME: Achoo
SpreadCold.DESCRIPTION: $damage NL Apply !M! Piruru:Cold to target and to adjacent enemies.

FlameBarrierButCold.NAME: cold
FlameBarrierButCold.DESCRIPTION: $block NL Whenever you are attacked this turn, apply Piruru:Cold back.
